snippet.title: Death's Gambit: Afterlife - Official Trailer | Summer of Gaming 2021
snippet.description:
Action Platformer Death's Gambit: Afterlife is coming to Nintendo Switch with all-new content from Serenity Forge. Prepare for new ways to slash through enemies with brand new weapons, abilities and enhancements.

#IGN #SummerofGaming
